Claustrum animae, the reformed monastery, or, The love of Jesus a sure and short, pleasant and easie way to Heaven in meditations, directions, and resolutions to love and obey Jesus unto death : in two parts. Beaulieu, Luke, 1644 or 5-1723.
[243] p.
Printed for Henry Brome, London : 1677.
Part II has separate t.p. dated 1676. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

[243] p.
Printed for Henry Brome, London : 1677.
